Description:
Awtad, a leading real estate development and management company in Saudi Arabia, is seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Accountant to join its growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for monitoring and managing the financial activities of the company. The ideal candidate will be highly organized, have an eye for detail, and possess strong analytical skills. As an integral part of the Awtad team, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the company's mission to revolutionize the industry through innovative methods and technologies.Oversee and manage the company's financial accounting, monitoring and reporting systems
Prepare and file financial reports and statements to the relevant authorities, including tax returns, VAT, and other finance-related documentation
Perform reconciliations of all accounts to ensure accuracy and timely completion of financial reports and statements
Manage company's cash flow, budgeting, and forecasting, and make recommendations on ways to improve financial performance
Review and analyze financial data, identifying areas of risk and opportunity, and communicating these to management
Handle day-to-day bookkeeping tasks, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll operations
Assist in auditing activities, liaising with external auditors, and providing documentation and reports as requiredJob Details
